dt: {bc}a European freshwater cyprinid fish ({it}Barbus barbus{/it}) with four barbels on its upper jaw

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French, from Vulgar Latin {it}*barbellus{/it}, diminutive of Latin {it}barbus{/it} barbel, from {it}barba{/it} beard {ma}{mat|beard|}{/ma}
shortdef: a European freshwater cyprinid fish (Barbus barbus) with four barbels on its upper jaw; also : any of various closely related fishes

dt: {bc}a slender tactile process on the lips of certain fishes (such as catfishes)

et: obsolete French, from Middle French, diminutive of {it}barbe{/it} barb, beard
shortdef: a slender tactile process on the lips of certain fishes (such as catfishes)
